languages.text: "Я даю вам шанс решить дело миром и не совершать самоубийство... Во всех смыслах этого слова".
"I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid self-destruction... In every sense of the word."
languages.original_text: "Я даю вам шанс решить дело миром и не совершать самоубийство... Во всех смыслах этого слова".

traits.locale_text: "I am give you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and not commit suicide... In every sense of the word."
"I am give you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and not commit suicide... In every sense of the word."
"I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid suicide... In every sense of the word."
"I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid suicide... In every sense of the word."
"I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid self-destruction... In every sense of the word."
"I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid self-destruction... In every sense of the word."

languages.text: « Je vous laisse une chance de régler cette affaire pacifiquement, en évitant l'autodestruction... dans tous les sens du terme. »
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid self-destruction... In every sense of the word."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous laisse une chance de régler cette affaire pacifiquement, en évitant le suicide... dans tous les sens du terme. »

languages.text: «Os voy a dar una oportunidad de resolver esto por las buenas y evitar la autodestrucción... en todos los sentidos de la palabra».
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid self-destruction... In every sense of the word."

traits.locale_text: «Os voy a dar una oportunidad de resolver esto por las buenas y evitar el suicidio... en todos los sentidos de la palabra».

languages.text: “我希望能与你们和平解决这场冲突。毕竟，从某种方面来说……我可不想干掉我自己。”
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid self-destruction... In every sense of the word."

traits.locale_text: “我希望能与你们和平解决这场冲突。毕竟，从某种方面来说……我可不想自杀。”

languages.text: 「私はお前に、この問題を平和的に解決し、自滅を回避するチャンスを与えているのだ…あらゆる意味でな」
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid self-destruction... In every sense of the word."

traits.locale_text: 「私はお前に、この問題を平和的に解決し、自死を回避するチャンスを与えているのだ…あらゆる意味でな」

languages.text: "Ich gebe Euch die Chance, diese Angelegenheit friedlich zu klären und eine Selbstzerstörung zu vermeiden ... In jedem Sinn des Wortes."
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid self-destruction... In every sense of the word."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe Euch die Chance, diese Angelegenheit friedlich zu klären und einen Suizid zu vermeiden ... In jedem Sinn des Wortes."

languages.text: "Bu tartışmayı barışçıl bir şekilde çözüp her anlamda kendi kendinizi imha etmemeniz için size bir şans veriyorum..."
languages.original_text: "I am giving you a chance to settle this affair peacefully and avoid self-destruction... In every sense of the word."
